resources.string: This is a persistent Bottom Sheet
You can show the rest of this sheet by sliding up.
As you can see this is the extra content that you can show to the users after sliding this bottom sheet.
This is an example activity to test bottom sheets which is added to the Android Support Library at v23.2.0

There are two types of bottom sheets:

Persistent bottom sheets: it is always shown as you can see it below.

Modal bottom sheets: it is alternative to menus or simple dialogs. You can test it by clicking the button below.
